text: The Val d'Ille U Classic 35 was a road bicycle race held annually in France. It was organized as a 1.2 event on the UCI Europe Tour from 2010 until 2012, and as a 1.1 for its final edition in 2013. The event was last held in 2013. It was part of UCI Europe Tour in category 1.2 from 2010 to 2012, when it upgraded to 1.1 in 2013. ==Winners== ==References== Category:UCI Europe Tour races Category:Cycle races in France Category:2001 establishments in France Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2001
title: Val d'Ille Classic
